College_Station.KZNE: KZNE (1150 AM, "Sports Radio 1150 The Zone") is a sports talk formatted radio station owned by the Bryan Broadcasting Corporation through its licensee Bryan Broadcasting License Corporation, broadcasting in College Station, Texas. It currently offers a mix of local programming on weekday afternoons, ESPN Radio network programming on weekday mornings, and Fox Sports Radio shows on weekends and weeknights. The station also serves as an affiliate of the Jim Rome Show and broadcasts Texas A&M University athletic events and local high school football games.
